alert.note: Alert for Columbia; Sauk (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 19 at 9:27PM CDT until May 19 at 10:30PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Milwaukee/Sullivan has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Columbia County in south central Wisconsin... Northern Sauk County in south central Wisconsin... * Until 1030 PM CDT. * At 927 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Elroy to near Hillsboro to La Farge, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Baraboo, Reedsburg, Wisconsin Dells, Lake Delton, West Baraboo, Bluffview, North Freedom, La Valle, Rock Springs, Loganville, Ironton, Lime Ridge and Devils Lake St Park. This includes the following Locations Mirror Lake State Park and Kilbourn Dam. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
